title: The Devil Knows You're Dead (Matthew Scudder #11)
description: Storyline: The Devil Knows You're Dead (Matthew Scudder #11) When Yuppie lawyer Glenn Holtzmann sits in his penthouse gazing at the setting sun, he little imagines that within half an hour he will be dead. Everyone believes it to be a clear-cut case, but Scudder isn't convinced that the evidence or the victim are what they seem.
author: Lawrence Block
